messages.title: CAN YOU AFFORD THE LIB DEMS?
messages.content: 6 THINGS THEY DON'T WANT YOU TO KNOW

keyPolicies.policyDescription: LibDems propose introducing a local income tax which an independent inquiry found would add 6.6p to the basic rate of tax.
LibDems plan to remove universal child benefit and tax family income.
Nick Clegg of LibDems has called for 'savage cuts' of £20 billion a year in public services, including the NHS.
LibDems proposed scrapping the Winter Fuel Allowance for people between 60 and 65.
LibDems favor giving British citizenship to illegal immigrants, which is estimated to cost the taxpayer £1 billion.
LibDems allegedly voted for measures that could provide rights to rapists and murderers, according to the leaflet.

issues.health: Labours guarantees specialist doctors and more nurses than in 1997.
issues.immigration: LibDems favor giving British citizenship to illegal immigrants with an estimated cost of £1 billion.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour promises three-quarters of GP practices with extended opening hours.

housing.content: The Tories plan to create money from existing social tenants in mixed tenure blocks on estates and prefab buildings.

quotes.text: Only Labour can beat the Tories. A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party will let the Tories win.

images.caption: Leaflet page outlining criticisms of the Lib Dems and promoting Labour over the Tories and Lib Dems.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet compares Labour's health service improvements to potential cuts by the Lib Dems, and Labour's ability to beat Tories in contrast to the Lib Dems who are portrayed as unable to win.
